Description: Welcome to your dream home in the desirable Brighton Lakes community! This spacious 4-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom residence features high ceilings and an open floor plan, perfect for modern living. The master suite, conveniently located downstairs, offers privacy and comfort.    Step into the eat-in kitchen, ideal for casual meals and entertaining. The home boasts a great room as well as a living room and dining room combo, providing ample space for relaxation and gatherings. Enjoy your morning coffee or evening sunset on the back patio, which offers a lovely view of the tranquil pond.    Brighton Lakes offers fantastic amenities including tennis courts and a community pool, enhancing your lifestyle with recreation and leisure just steps away. Don’t miss the opportunity to make this exceptional property your new home!

Primary bathroom: Features: Garden Bath,  Makeup/Vanity Space,  Tub with Separate Shower Stall

Features: Cathedral Ceiling(s), Eating Space In Kitchen, Kitchen/Family Room Combo, Living Room/Dining Room Combo, Split Bedroom, Walk-In Closet(s)

Attic: Cathedral Ceiling(s), Ceiling Fan(s), Eating Space In Kitchen, High Ceilings, Kitchen/Family Room Combo, Living Room/Dining Room Combo, Primary Bedroom Main Floor, Split Bedroom, Walk-In Closet(s)
Exterior features: Sidewalk, Sliding Doors, Tennis Court(s)

Lot: Features: City Lot, In County, Landscaped, Sidewalk, 0 to less than 1/4 Acre
